concept.title: Advance Calendar Period
concept.abstract: The Advance Calendar Period functionality is specific to Calendar type subscription plans. This functionality allows the staff user to define a period of time prior to the end of their fiscal calendar year end that first time purchasing subscribers will be purchasing the next fiscal year’s subscription while receiving the remaining current fiscal year’s subscription free of charge. This means that the first Term of the subscription and any Badges assigned to the subscriber will have a start date of Today with an end date being the end of the fiscal year. For subscriptions purchased in the Advance Calendar Period, the product will not begin recognizing revenue until the end of the first month of the fiscal year purchased. No revenue will be recognized for the current term’s free months.

ol.li: Navigate to the Subscription Plan record.

Enter the number of days you wish to define as free in the Advance Calendar Period field.
Example: The Organization’s fiscal year ends on 12/31 but they want anyone that purchases a subscription on or after 10/1 to get the remainder of the current term for free---->Advance Calendar Period = 92
